verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Kikondoo cha Mungu, mkate wa mbinguni,
mlishi wa roho yangu, nakuabudu.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
1. U babangu mwema namsimamizi,
mpaji wa uzima, wangu mwokozi.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
2. Fumbo abudiwanakuamini,Kaza,
Yesu mpendwa, yangu imani

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
3. Mlo wa roho yangu, hostia nzima,
niwie ya mbingu kweli amana.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
4. Ee Rabi,Mtu-Mungu,unirizishe,
Njoo, shuka kwangu kanishibishe.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
5. Anakaribia mpenzi amini,
hata kaingia mwangu moyoni.
